stat_fields.armour.physical: Physical damage reduction. Higher = less physical damage taken.
stat_fields.armour.magick: Magick damage reduction. Higher = less elemental/magick damage taken.
stat_fields.armour.stability: Stability armour. Higher = harder to stagger/break guard.
stat_fields.armour.attunement_scaling: Per-armour-type stat scaling. Shows which attributes (AT_COURAGE, AT_SPIRIT, AT_GRACE) increase each armour type and by how much.
stat_fields.requirements: Minimum attribute levels needed to equip the piece.
stat_fields.set_name: Armour set this piece belongs to (e.g. 'Bromius', 'Garren').
stat_fields.upgrades (totems): Stat bonuses provided by the totem. Types include AVATAR_ATTRIBUTE_PRIMARY_{COURAGE,SPIRIT,GRACE}, AVATAR_ARMOUR, AVATAR_STABILITY_ARMOUR, WEAPON_MELEE_DAMAGE, WEAPON_STABILITY_DAMAGE.
